price: 63. (Estos) dijeron: “Hemos venido para traer (a tu gente el castigo) sobre el que dudaban.
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ جِئۡنَٰكَ بِمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qālū bal ji'nāka bimā kānū fīhi yamtarūna
